text: Kasur Junction railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Pakistan. Kasur Junction was a junction before the partition of India and Pakistan. But after partition it became only a railway station. From here, a branch line used to go to Amritsar junction via Ferozepur, now after the division of this line is dead end. In today's time there is only one train arrival and departure. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Kasur District Category:Railway stations on Lodhran–Raiwind Line
title: Kasur Junction railway station
